translations: n.[生物] 活力论；[生物] 生机说

phrs.translation: 生机说, 活力论, 生机论, 活机论

sentences.sentence: Modern vitalism is, of course, much more important and exciting.
sentences.translation: 当然，现代生机论更为重要和令人激动得多。

sentences.sentence: True, no biologist has really believed in vitalism for more than a century.
sentences.translation: 事实上经历了一个世纪后没有任何生物学家还相信这一论调。
